segments.text: Hello , how are you doing today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve been having trouble breathing lately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you had any type of cold lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I haven ’ t had a cold . I just have a heavy feeling in my chest when I try to breathe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any allergies that you know of ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don ’ t have any allergies that I know of .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does this happen all the time or mostly when you are active ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It happens a lot when I work out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am going to send you to a pulmonary specialist who can run tests on you for asthma .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your help , doctor .
segments.speaker: S2
